name: USB-C to 3.5mm Headphone Adapter
why_recommended: Industry benchmark for budget quality, clean output, used in ASR testing
research_notes: Actual measurements ~30mW @ 32Ω, excellent for low-impedance IEMs, limited power for demanding headphones

name: Dawn Pro
why_recommended: Best value dongle DAC, transparent sound, drives most IEMs and efficient headphones
research_notes: Community favorite, check Shenzhen Audio or Moondrop official store for current pricing

name: Moonriver 2
why_recommended: Flagship dongle with exceptional power, drives demanding headphones, premium build
research_notes: Newer release, verify current availability and pricing

name: S9 Pro
why_recommended: Balanced output at budget price, good build quality, portable
research_notes: Check Amazon or Aliexpress for current pricing

name: TC44C
why_recommended: Compact, well-built dongle for IEMs and efficient headphones
research_notes: Budget-friendly alternative to Dawn Pro

name: UA2 Plus
why_recommended: Higher power output than most dongles, good for harder-to-drive headphones
research_notes: Verify current model availability

name: T71
why_recommended: Dongle with Qudelix app integration, customizable EQ, great for tweakers

name: SHIO
why_recommended: IEM-focused dongle from reputable brand, clean sound

name: 5K
why_recommended: Most customizable portable DAC/amp, extensive EQ options, Bluetooth with LDAC, exceptional app support

name: BTR5 2021
why_recommended: Portable Bluetooth DAC/amp with balanced output, good app support, reliable performance

name: UA5

name: RU6
why_recommended: R2R ladder DAC in dongle form factor, warm analog-like sound, audiophile favorite
